shared.filt

Class InsignificantComponentAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.filt.InsignificantComponentAnalysis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSetFilter, ReversibleFilter

    public class InsignificantComponentAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReversibleFilter
    A filter that performs PCA on a set of data and then keeps the smallest eigenvalues instead of the largest
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
